name: Pixel Royale (itch) (Jack Hensley)
description:
Buy your team of units to fight another player automatically each round. 

Click on a unit in the shop to buy it. Move  it to the white ring to put it in your lineup. 

Get 3 of the same unit to combine them into a more powerful version of that unit. 

Leveling up will increase the amount of units you can have in your lineup and increase the chances of stronger units appearing in the store.

During battle, units attack one at a time from left to right. 

If you lose a battle, you lose health equal to the amount of enemies left. The game ends when there is only one player remaining. 

Sell a unit by moving it to the trash can icon on the left side of the screen.

Synergies can be seen by hovering your mouse over the icons in the top left corner. Synergies will give your team powerful buffs. They can be activated by having the required number of unique units matching the respective synergy. (Not yet Implemented)
